Title: Lowers the threshold for eligibility for the appropriation of moneys for the promotion of agriculture and domestic arts
Summary: Lowers the threshold for eligibility for the appropriation of moneys for the promotion of agriculture and domestic arts from five thousand dollars to two thousand five hundred dollars.
LawCode: Amd ยง286, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to eligibility for the appropriation of moneys for the promotion of agriculture and domestic arts
